sentences.sContent: Notice that the St. Louis memo tiptoes around the question of telling a depositor that he has a demand deposit while telling the rest of the country that he has a time deposit.
sentences.sContent_eng: Notice that the St. Louis memo tiptoes around the question of telling a depositor that he has a demand deposit while telling the rest of the country that he has a time deposit.
sentences.sCn: 请注意，圣路易斯储备银行的备忘录一直在一个问题上遮遮掩掩，那就是把存款人的活期存款说成定期存款，欺骗国人。

words.tran: 受托人；受托公司；储藏所

trans.tranOther: someone who puts money in a bank or other financial organization
